elements.title: Phoenix 1.6.0 Released (Phoenix Framework)
elements.contents: Phoenix 1.6 is out! This release ships with new authentication and mailer generators, a new HEEx template engine, and more.

elements.title: Improving Testing & Continuous Integration in Phoenix (Phoenix Framework)
elements.contents: A walk-through showing how we approach testing and CI for the Phoenix project and how recent changes have made this process much  smoother

elements.title: Phoenix LiveView Uploads Deep Dive (Phoenix Framework)
elements.contents: A step-by-step deep dive into the new Phoenix LiveView uploads feature. We go from direct-to-server uploads to direct-to-cloud.

elements.title: Build a real-time Twitter clone in 15 minutes with LiveView and Phoenix 1.5 (Phoenix Framework)
elements.contents:
With the Phoenix v1.5 release, learn how easy LiveView makes
it to build interactive, real-time applications.

elements.title: ElixirConf 2019 Keynote (Phoenix Framework)
elements.contents:
Chris McCord's closing keynote of ElixirConf 2019:
Phoenix LiveView – a step-change for web development

elements.title: Phoenix 1.4.0 Released (Phoenix Framework)
elements.contents: Phoenix 1.4 is out! This release ships with exciting new features like HTTP2 support, improved development experience, and more.

elements.title: Contribution Sprint (Phoenix Framework)
elements.contents: This week we hosted our first contribution sprint

elements.title: The Road to 2 Million Websocket Connections in Phoenix (Phoenix Framework)
elements.contents: If you have been paying attention on Twitter recently, you have likely seen some increasing numbers regarding the number of simultaneous connections the Phoenix web framework can handle. This post documents some of the techniques used to perform the benchmarks.

elements.title: Phoenix 1.0 – the framework for the modern web just landed (Phoenix Framework)
elements.contents: After a year and a half of work, 2500 commits, and 30 releases, Phoenix 1.0 is here!

elements.title: Phoenix 0.10.0 released with assets handling, generators, & more (Phoenix Framework)
elements.contents: We released Phoenix 0.10.0 this weekend and we’re really excited to share the new features we’ve been working on.
